name: Retro10
description:
Retro 10 is our celebration of ten years since the release of Retro One, on the Xbox 360 ten years ago.

Retro 10 is a classic style 2D `SHMUP` side scrolling space shooter. Shoot everything, collect power-ups, destroy big boss space ships.

Survive for as long as you can and get your best score.

Retro fun in a classic arcade SHMUP shooter. 2D horizontal scrolling space scene with hordes of baddies attacking you.
80`s style retro fun, on a modern device.
